official_title: A joint resolution to designate the week beginning August 2, 1987, as "International Special Olympics Week", and to designate August 3, 1987, as "International Special Olympics Day".

summary.text: Designates the week beginning August 2, 1987, as International Special Olympics Week and designates August 3, 1987, as International Special Olympics Day.
